languages.text: {n}Проктор властно складывает руки на груди.{/n} "Обвинение зачитано не по форме, ваша юрисдикция на судне Вольного Торговца не имеет силы, статус члена свиты не учтен — мне продолжать, или несостоятельность вашего "ареста" уже очевидна?"

{n}Solomorne folds his arms.{/n} "Your accusation does not follow protocol; you have no authority on the Rogue Trader's ship; you did not account for Pasqal's status as a member of {mf|his|her} retinue — shall I continue, or is the inadequacy of your 'arrest' clear enough already?"
languages.original_text: {n}Проктор властно складывает руки на груди.{/n} "Обвинение зачитано не по форме, ваша юрисдикция на судне Вольного Торговца не имеет силы, статус члена свиты не учтен — мне продолжать, или несостоятельность вашего "ареста" уже очевидна?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne folds his arms.{/n} "Your accusation does not follow protocol, you have no authority on the Rogue Trader's ship, you did not account for Pasqal's status as a member of the retinue — shall I continue or is the inadequacy of your 'arrest' apparent enough already?"

{n}Solomorne folds his arms.{/n} "Your accusation does not follow protocol, you have no authority on the Rogue Trader's ship, you did not account for Pasqal's status as a member of the retinue — shall I continue or is the inadequacy of your 'arrest' apparent enough already?"

{n}Solomorne folds his arms.{/n} "Your accusation does not follow protocol; you have no authority on the Rogue Trader's ship; you did not account for Pasqal's status as a member of {mf|his|her} retinue — shall I continue, or is the inadequacy of your 'arrest' clear enough already?"

{n}Solomorne folds his arms.{/n} "Your accusation does not follow protocol; you have no authority on the Rogue Trader's ship; you did not account for Pasqal's status as a member of {mf|his|her} retinue — shall I continue, or is the inadequacy of your 'arrest' clear enough already?"

{n}Solomorne folds his arms.{/n} "Your accusation does not follow protocol; you have no authority on the Rogue Trader's ship; you did not account for Pasqal's status as a member of {mf|his|her} retinue — shall I continue, or is the inadequacy of your 'arrest' clear enough already?"

{n}Solomorne folds his arms.{/n} "Your accusation does not follow protocol; you have no authority on the Rogue Trader's ship; you did not account for Pasqal's status as a member of {mf|his|her} retinue — shall I continue, or is the inadequacy of your 'arrest' clear enough already?"

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙叉着双臂。{/n}“一，你的指控不符合标准程序。二，这里是行商浪人的船，你无权发号施令。三，帕斯卡是行商浪人的随从，但这一点你却没有考虑。你还要我继续说下去吗？还是说，你已经意识到了这场‘逮捕’理由不充分？”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne folds his arms.{/n} "Your accusation does not follow protocol; you have no authority on the Rogue Trader's ship; you did not account for Pasqal's status as a member of {mf|his|her} retinue — shall I continue, or is the inadequacy of your 'arrest' clear enough already?"

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙叉着双臂。{/n}“一，你的指控不符合标准程序。二，这里是行商浪人的船，你无权发号施令。三，帕斯卡是行商浪人的随从，但这一点你却没有考虑。你还要我继续说下去吗？还是说，你已经意识到了这场‘逮捕’理由不充分？”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne cruza los brazos.{/n} «Su acusación no sigue los protocolos. No tiene autoridad en la nave de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. No ha tenido en cuenta la posición de Pasqal como miembro de su séquito. ¿Necesita que continúe, o ya le queda claro lo inadecuado de su "arresto"?».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne folds his arms.{/n} "Your accusation does not follow protocol; you have no authority on the Rogue Trader's ship; you did not account for Pasqal's status as a member of {mf|his|her} retinue — shall I continue, or is the inadequacy of your 'arrest' clear enough already?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne cruza los brazos.{/n} «Su acusación no sigue los protocolos. No tiene autoridad en la nave de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. No ha tenido en cuenta la posición de Pasqal como miembro de su séquito. ¿Necesita que continúe, o ya le queda claro lo inadecuado de su "arresto"?».

languages.text: {n}Solomorne croise les bras sur sa poitrine.{/n} « Vos accusations ne respectent pas le protocole. Vous n'avez aucune autorité sur un vaisseau de libre-marchand. Vous avez omis de prendre en considération le statut de Pasqal, membre de son entourage. Dois-je continuer, ou est-ce suffisant ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne folds his arms.{/n} "Your accusation does not follow protocol; you have no authority on the Rogue Trader's ship; you did not account for Pasqal's status as a member of {mf|his|her} retinue — shall I continue, or is the inadequacy of your 'arrest' clear enough already?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne croise les bras sur sa poitrine.{/n} « Vos accusations ne respectent pas le protocole. Vous n'avez aucune autorité sur un vaisseau de libre-marchand. Vous avez omis de prendre en considération le statut de Pasqal, membre de son entourage. Dois-je continuer, ou est-ce suffisant ? »

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは腕を組んだ。{/n}「お前の告発は手続きに則っていない。ローグトレーダーの船内ではお前に権限はない。パスカルが従者の一人であるという事実も無視されている。まだ指摘を続けるか？それとも、お前の『逮捕』がいかに不備だらけか、もう十分に明らかになったか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne folds his arms.{/n} "Your accusation does not follow protocol; you have no authority on the Rogue Trader's ship; you did not account for Pasqal's status as a member of {mf|his|her} retinue — shall I continue, or is the inadequacy of your 'arrest' clear enough already?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは腕を組んだ。{/n}「お前の告発は手続きに則っていない。ローグトレーダーの船内ではお前に権限はない。パスカルが従者の一人であるという事実も無視されている。まだ指摘を続けるか？それとも、お前の『逮捕』がいかに不備だらけか、もう十分に明らかになったか？」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne kollarını kavuşturuyor.{/n} "Suçlaman protokole uygun değil, Hür Tacir'in gemisinde yetkin yok. Pasqal'ın onun maiyetinde olduğunu hesaba katmadın... Devam edeyim mi yoksa 'tutuklamanın' yetersizliği yeterince açık mı?"
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne folds his arms.{/n} "Your accusation does not follow protocol; you have no authority on the Rogue Trader's ship; you did not account for Pasqal's status as a member of {mf|his|her} retinue — shall I continue, or is the inadequacy of your 'arrest' clear enough already?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne kollarını kavuşturuyor.{/n} "Suçlaman protokole uygun değil, Hür Tacir'in gemisinde yetkin yok, Pasqal'ın {mf|onun|onun} maiyetinin bir üyesi olduğunu hesaba katmadın... Devam edeyim mi yoksa 'tutuklamanın' yetersizliği yeterince açık mı?"

languages.text: {n}Solomorne verschränkt die Arme.{/n} "Eure Anklage folgt nicht dem Protokoll. Ihr habt keine Autorität auf dem Schiff {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}. Ihr habt Pasqals Status als Mitglied {mf|seines|ihres} Gefolges nicht berücksichtigt – soll ich weitersprechen, oder ist Euch die Unangemessenheit Eurer 'Verhaftung' bereits klar genug?"
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne folds his arms.{/n} "Your accusation does not follow protocol; you have no authority on the Rogue Trader's ship; you did not account for Pasqal's status as a member of {mf|his|her} retinue — shall I continue, or is the inadequacy of your 'arrest' clear enough already?"

Ihr habt Pasqals Status als Mitglied {mf|seines|ihres} Gefolges nicht berücksichtigt – soll ich weitersprechen, oder ist Euch die Unangemessenheit Eurer 'Verhaftung' bereits klar genug?"
